plot: R D Nayanar, the former Asst City Police Commissioner of Trivandrum, comes back to the city after a gap of seven years. Not as the police commissioner..
title: Janathipathyam
plot_es: R D Nayanar, the former Asst City Police Commissioner of Trivandrum, comes back to the city after a gap of seven years. Not as the police commissioner..
plot_en: R D Nayanar, the former Asst City Police Commissioner of Trivandrum, comes back to the city after a gap of seven years. Not as the police commissioner..
